com.fluidops.ajax.components

Class FContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FComponent
      • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FEventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FAbstractTextInputWithAutosuggestion, FAsynchContainer, FComponentList, FDateTimePicker, FDateTimePicker.TimeSelector, FDateTimeRangePicker, FDesktop, FDesktopLayout, FDesktopWindow, FDialog, FDropdownContainer, FDropDownMenuT, FEditTable, FForm, FForm2, FGrid, FGroupedDataView, FLayouter, FLayoutTable, FList, FMultiContainer, FMultiTextfieldInput, FNumberField, FPage, FPageComponent, FPopupWindow, FRadioButtonGroup, FRadioButtonGroup.FRadioButton, FSideBar, FSimpleList, FSimpleList2, FSlider, FStatusBar, FTable, FTabPane2, FTabPane2Lazy, FTextInput3, FTree, JDBCBrowser, MinimizableContainer, SSH, Window

    public class FContainer
extends FComponent
    implements the component container concept. So far we had two cases: 1) supercomponent handled everything for its kids, kids are no components (see FTree) 2) fixed number of subcomponents which are references via parent_child1, parent_child2 (see JDBCBrowser) This Container allows other containers or components to be registered in the page, handle their own events etc. Components can be added and removed dynamically. Deltas can be propagated without the need for a complete redraw. container components are required to have the container's id as a prefix in their own id
    Author:
    aeb, as, ts

      • setStringTemplateParameter

        public void setStringTemplateParameter(java.lang.String key,
                              java.lang.Object value)
        caller can set / delete additional parameters that are used in the .st file. for instance, a condition can be realized as follows: x.st:
        $if (flag)$ bla $endif$
        container: x.setStringTemplateParameter( "flag", true );
        Parameters:
        key - name on the parameters which is referenced in the .st file
        value - value of the parameter, if null, the value is removed

        Parameters:
